previewArticle.title: Real Salt Lake vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Real Salt Lake 3, Montreal Impact 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Real Salt Lake continue their homestand against Canadian opposition when the Montréal Impact visit Rio Tinto Stadium for an interconference clash on Thursday evening.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Real Salt Lake vs Montreal Impact | July 24, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: John Coon
timelineItems.text: #RSL has won one time in its last eight #MLS matches. Salt Lake has been outscored 13-7 by opponents in its last nine games overall.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Dominer, jouer au sol et mettre Montréal à terre : la mission de Salt Lake lors de #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: ESPN 700
timelineItems.text: There is something in the air that just says this is going to be a good game. Everyone in the #RioT can feel it. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Rio Tinto Stadium on Pioneer Day in the Beehive State. #RSLvMTL http://t.co/jM6CThT2Fy

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Rio Tinto Stadium on Pioneer Day in the Beehive State. #RSLvMTL http://t.co/jM6CThT2Fy

timelineItems.name: Andre Gagne
timelineItems.text: Au moins, MDV semble être venu pour jouer LUI! #imfc

timelineItems.name: OffTheWoodworkx
timelineItems.text: Berniet keeps dropping deeper and deeper...not good...will he last 90'? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Brent Ramey
timelineItems.text: Pioneer Day at the RSL game. God Bless America!!! #rsl #realsaltlake http://t.co/aTktVcGHil

timelineItems.name: Carlos Caceres
timelineItems.text: At the #riot #RSL winning 1-0. #RealSaltLake http://t.co/ZgTJljCAUt

timelineItems.name: Carlos Caceres
timelineItems.text: At the #riot #RSL winning 1-0. #RealSaltLake http://t.co/ZgTJljCAUt

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Robbie Findley (Real Salt Lake).
Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Allons-y avec prédisons la foule du match de dimanche soir? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Ceux que l'on aime nous font le plus mal. #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Luke Mulholland scored on Pioneer Day, which is tied to the LDS church, which has a temple in Preston, Eng, which is LM's hometown. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Issey Nakajima-Farran (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Issey Nakajima-Farran attempts the back heel but misses the target

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Calum Mallace.

timelineItems.name: MaxMurray
timelineItems.text: L'avantage du 1-0 tôt c'est qu'on va voir si Klopas se rappelle comment faire un changement offensif #imfc #impactTVAsports #imfclive

timelineItems.desc: Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Chris Wingert impedes Camara

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Issey Nakajima-Farran (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Felipe Martins.

timelineItems.name: Marc-André Melo Rego
timelineItems.text: #ImpactTVASports #imfc doit grandir dans cette adversité et finalement sortir la tête de l'eau. Le talant ne manque pas ches nous.

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake News
timelineItems.text: Credit RSL defender Chris Schuler with the assist on Mulholland's goal. Big guy's first assist for 2014. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Albert
timelineItems.text: To all #NYCFC fans feeling like Lampard is too old to play, look at #IMFC Marco Di Vaio moving around the field. #FootballBrains

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Javier Morales sends an open look right at Bush

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).
Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Joao Plata.

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Allard
timelineItems.text: Lorsque tu es dernier de ta division, tu devrais adopter un alignement plus offensif. Difficile à comprendre.. #ImpactTVASports #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Issey Nakajima-Farran.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 1, Montreal Impact 0. Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Luke Mulholland blasts the half volley past Bush

timelineItems.name: Travis Cain
timelineItems.text: Every time "Believe" gets pumped through the PA at The Riot, I pray every #POR and #SEA fans feels something disturbing in the Force #RSL

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: TIME WELL SPENT: Faites comme moi, regardez vos circulaires d'épicerie pendant le match, y'a de bons spéciaux cette semaine. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Nat Borchers (Real Salt Lake) header from very close range is blocked. Assisted by Javier Morales with a cross.
Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.
Match ends, Real Salt Lake 3, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Olmes Garcia n'avait pas marqué depuis 1 an mais il avait préparé 3 célébrations pour ce match. #IMFCLive #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: François Séguin
timelineItems.text: No pride, no passion, no points. Again. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Alex Cayer
timelineItems.text: What is Krol doing on that play? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matteo Maldini
timelineItems.text: I volunteer to coach the Montreal Impact next season, will do it for free and will get as many wins, maybe more... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Lambert Côté
timelineItems.text: Pitoyable #imfc

timelineItems.desc: Real Salt Lake continue their homestand against Canadian opposition when the Montréal Impact visit Rio Tinto Stadium for an interconference clash on Thursday evening.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Real Salt Lake vs Montreal Impact | July 24, 2014

timelineItems.name: Uncle Benny
timelineItems.text: This game is already more interesting than the last 20 England internationals. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: This #imfc backline a complete shambles right now no organisation whatsoever

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.name: jbrisson
timelineItems.text: RSL est mortel en contre-attaque! #ImpactTVASports #IMFC

timelineItems.name: MaxMurray
timelineItems.text: Changement de mi-temps de gérant d'estrade Murray ; G-Laparé ou Mapp in - Mallace out, Felipe monte en pointe et go le 4-4-2 #imfc

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer

timelineItems.name: Uncle D!
timelineItems.text: My god Montréal's defense is weak. They really need to fix their back end if they want to get out of the basement #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: To advanced stats people, what are Felipe's chances of hitting the side of a barn? #IMFC #IMFClive #TSN690

timelineItems.comment: Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Albert
timelineItems.text: #IMFC seems to still be getting chances. As long as they manage the turnovers they can get back into it,

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Evan Bush stones the close range Plata shot

timelineItems.name: John Coon
timelineItems.text: Last road win for #IMFC came on September 8, 2013 when Montreal beat New England 4-2. Impact on a 8 game road winless streak in MLS in 2014.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: steve McDonald
timelineItems.text: J'accepte volontier que #imfc finisse dernier à la seule condition que la fin de saison soit pour donner du temps de jeu aux jeunes

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Krzysztof Krol tries a through ball, but Issey Nakajima-Farran is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Camara doit une couple de drinks à Bush qui vient de lui sauver les fesses après que Plata l'eut sorti de ses souliers. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Heath Pearce.

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: Can't tell if Bush or Ferrari made that save. Either/or, doesn't matter. It was a big one. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Patrice Bernier.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: It's good to see Beltran get forward so much in this match. He really needs to make that a priority. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Un contre ou - miracle - une phase arrêtée : rares points faibles défensifs de Salt Lake sur son terrain exploitables par Montréal #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Il est sympa le chant des supporters @RealSaltLake #RSLvMTL #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jerome Thibault
timelineItems.text: Allez, bonne nuit! #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: DCU_Exile
timelineItems.text: Wow. Defending Jao Plata 1v1 looks terrifying. #RSLvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.text: Les contre-attaque de #IMFC foirent systématiquement : porteur, passe, appel. Pick your poison. #IMFCLive #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.text: Still 1-0 after 30 at the RioT. Luke Mulholland is the reason why. http://t.co/mrGvTi1VD4 #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Waiting for the inevitable let down... but the Impact level. 1-1 #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jason Ashcraft
timelineItems.text: You could see that #MTL goal coming from a mile away. Poor defending by #RSL #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Michael Haycock
timelineItems.text: Someone needs to remind Wingert that he needs to work this holiday. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Sébastien Laplante
timelineItems.text: Je déteste voir Romero sur le terrain et McInerney et Mapp sur le banc @impactmontreal #ImpactTVASports @jayga75 #imfc

timelineItems.name: M
timelineItems.text: That was bad defending, pure and simple #RSL

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Première mention d'aide en carrière en MLS pour Calum Mallace / First career assist in MLS for @CMallace10 #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake News
timelineItems.text: Nick Rimando's @MLS-best tying 112th shutout will have to wait for another day after that Camara equalizer. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Mathieu Gravel
timelineItems.text: Beau travail de Mallace en milieu de terrain, on devrait le voir plus souvent comme titulaire. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: NC
timelineItems.text: I have to go water the plants more often. #camara scored and I did not see it. #imfclive #imfc #unlucky

timelineItems.name: MLS Fantasy Manager
timelineItems.text: Ok, who picked up Hassoun Camara this week? #IMFC #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.text: Montreal coach Frank Klopas has his bench warming up midway through the first half. Hmmmm….. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Real Salt Lake has entered the over-the-top balls to Robbie Findley and Joao Plata stage of the attack. Common theme tonight.

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Coallier
timelineItems.text: Est ce qu'on sait finalement quand Ignacio Piatti sera disponible pour l'Impact #IMFC #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.name: John Coon
timelineItems.text: It was only a matter of time before Montreal scored. #IMFC had been creating some solid chances prior to its equalizer. Strong passing.

timelineItems.text: Are you kidding me? #imfc

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: #IMFC are horrible with defensive corners & set pieces

timelineItems.name: Alek Avendaño
timelineItems.text: Ouah ... Tout seul le mec. #IMFC

timelineItems.text: It's always funny when the crowd falls victim to perspective. Plata's shot hits the side netting. Still 1-1 here. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Point tactique : Observer avec grande curiosité l'entente entre Mallace et Bernier. #IMFCLive #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Mr. Brian Fries
timelineItems.text: Same @RealSaltLake story, we score and then we park the bus and we tie. Let's get back to attacking soon. #frustrated but still love #rsl

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Ce match #RSLvMTL ne manque pas de spectacle ni d'occasions

timelineItems.name: ImpactSoccer.com
timelineItems.text: Je m'inscris en faux avec ce que je lis depuis le début du match : les contre-attaques de #RSL ne m'impressionnent pas plus que ça.

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Hassoun Camara has been the most dangerous player on the field thus far, and he's a defender for the Montreal Impact.

timelineItems.text: Cheap shot by Camara WELL after play

timelineItems.name: jeremy filosa
timelineItems.text: Super bonne demie première pour @HassCamara6, il est partout, un gros but en plus, un boulet, le gardien n'a eu aucune chance. #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Krzysztof Krol.

timelineItems.text: While not on the traditional or modern gift list the post-modernism 4th Anniversary gift is MLS game tickets. Go #RSL http://t.co/abGeCnSza5

timelineItems.name: Marc-André Morency
timelineItems.text: #ImpactTVASports Evan Bush me convainc amplement avec ses performances actuelles plus championnat concacaf! #imfc

timelineItems.name: Justin Carmony
timelineItems.text: I think it’s Borchers beard that is throwing off his header abilities… #RSL #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.text: While not on the traditional or modern gift list the post-modernism 4th Anniversary gift is MLS game tickets. Go #RSL http://t.co/abGeCnSza5

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Nat Borchers (Real Salt Lake) header from very close range misses to the right. Assisted by Joao Plata with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Albert
timelineItems.text: That looked like 2-1.. #IMFC needs to double up on Plata..

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Bon Hassoun arrête tes bêtises avec Plata. Botte moi ce petit gros ;) #IMFCLive #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Real Salt Lake 1, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Ty Jensen
timelineItems.text: Ugh come on #rsl we need 3pts

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: As good as Hassoun Camara has been going forward tonight, he's gotten ripped to shreds by Joao Plata on the other end. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Jeff Cassar specifically said this week Real Salt Lake couldn't let Montreal hang around. Impact aren't just hanging. They're chilling.

timelineItems.name: Jay!
timelineItems.text: If Borchers & Beckerman go up for a header & get their beard and hair tangled, does #RSL have a stylist on standby for the resulting

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: RSL got to the corner flag five times in the first half. Montreal? A few fewer — 0. That's a zero. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Real Salt Lake 1, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Michael Sagers
timelineItems.text: Let's keep the attack pressure on boys and get three points with a strong second half. GO RSL. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: C'est reparti à #RSLvMTL où je m'attends à voir l'équipe locale tenter d'étouffer son adversaire.

timelineItems.text: Mallace qui manque le 2ème ballon... Tu sers à quoi? #imfc

timelineItems.name: Eric
timelineItems.text: Wow. Di Vaio a vraiment perdu sa vitesse. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Huge free kick here. Allez Montréal! #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Looks like Mulholland had positioning on that challenge. Ref calls it differently and #MTL has a free kick. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: THANK YOU to the 20,398 who #BELIEVE and #FillTheRioT tonight ... #RSL 6th straight sellout + 8th in 10 home games this season

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Nevermind guys, he reversed the call. #RSL will get the ball here.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - Matteo Ferrari scored for both teams the last time Montreal played RSL in #MLS, his only goal and own goal in MLS play. Fair. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: Klopas has gotten over his bromance with Warner. His new bromance flame: Calum Mallace. Can we get another brovorce please? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Last time Robbie Findley and Joao Plata started up top was June 28 at Chivas USA — Luke Mulholland was sent off in the 9th minute. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: In 59 fewer games MT @chriskamrani: Shutout tonight and GK Rimando will tie all-time reg. season shutout record held by Hartman at 112. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: RSL absolutely MUST get 3 points tonight. Best opportunity to bust the slump and get some confidence back. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Vector
timelineItems.text: I like catching people's looks when they're at The RioT for their first time and they watch @LaBarraReal march in. Welcome to Futbol #rsl

timelineItems.name: Loredana Panza
timelineItems.text: Lmao what ????? Can a ref change the decision like that ?! He clearly called for a Montreal free kick ?!!! #imfc

timelineItems.name: Cris0rtiz
timelineItems.text: Alright, we need this win. i'm not mad anymore if we don't make it, but lets at least try to make this little push #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.text: 1 - RSL just conceded the first goal in a 1-1 draw for the first time since March 2013 despite drawing 1-1 six times since. Trend. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Bon match à tous! #IMFC #RSL

timelineItems.name: Rachel Donner
timelineItems.text: Nick's in the black kit. Me likey. #RSL

timelineItems.text: This girl is really talented. She was singing in American and Canadian. #RSL #DadJoke

timelineItems.text: Assez discret Morales aujourd'hui #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Luke Mulholland's finishing: 10. His dancing ... hey, look at that goal again! 1-0 in Rio Tinto. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Luke Mulholland smashes a one timer right at Bush

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: We should play an intra squad game next week, at least we'll be sure not to lose. #imfc

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Evan Bush denies a Javier Morales shot and the Olmes Garcia follow up

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: No midfield linkup between Mallace, Bernier and Felipe!! #IMFC #IMFCLive #TSN690

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Chris Wingert with a cross.
Attempt saved. Olmes García (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).
Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Andrea León
timelineItems.text: Go real salt lake ! #RealSaltLake # RSL #Soccer #RioTinto http://t.co/Qhc9HPS8e8

timelineItems.name: Andrea León
timelineItems.text: Go real salt lake ! #RealSaltLake # RSL #Soccer #RioTinto http://t.co/Qhc9HPS8e8

timelineItems.text: Bush vient de faire des miracles #IMFC

timelineItems.name: D. Young
timelineItems.text: How do you not score there?!? #RSL

timelineItems.name: Jordan Close
timelineItems.text: Almost Garcia at it again #RSL

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: Wow... Just wow... #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: JS Bournival
timelineItems.text: save. of. the. week. #bushforpresident #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Issey Nakajima-Farran tries a through ball, but Marco Di Vaio is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Did Bush teleport across the goal line? What a save. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Enfin! #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Bush a justifie sa titularisation. On souhaite au moins un point à #IMFC pour ne pas oublier son arrêt. #IMFCLive #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: ENCORE GROS MATCH DE FELIPE. DOMMAGE QU'IL SORTE À LA 60ÈME. #IMFCLive #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Issey Nakajima-Farran (Montreal Impact) is shown the red card for a bad challenge.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Issey Nakajima-Farran flies into Schuler with his studs up

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Bienvenue en #MLS Gagnon-Laparé! @academieimpact. #IMFCLive #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Issey Nakajima-Farran (Montreal Impact).
Chris Schuler (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Andre Gagne
timelineItems.text: Jamais la police va laisse @ebushel1 quitter le stade de #RSL !! #voleur #wow #Robbery #BigSavesInARow #imfc

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: We're screwed now #imfc #redcard

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: ...and we were about to win... #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: james b.
timelineItems.text: Damn straight that's a red #RSLvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Chris Schuler (Real Salt Lake) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Waddinho
timelineItems.text: Sheesh. First impression: studs WAY up. Right call. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact).
Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: I smell Fantasy dreams going up in smoke. RT @empiregass No Issey NOOOOOO!! #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: EIGHT straight games RSL has seen a red card or penalty kick. That's quite the streak. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 2, Montreal Impact 1. Olmes Garcia (Real Salt Lake) header from the center of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Javier Morales.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Olmes Garcia rises up to power home the header

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake).
Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Nick Firchau and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Thursday night match between Real Salt Lake and the Montreal Impact. Watch it on Univision Deportes kicking off at 10pm ET.
timelineItems.title: Real Salt Lake vs. Montreal Impact July 24, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: RSL really should be getting the 3 points here & they've made a great start. Mulholland justifying his selection over Gil already. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Javier Morales.
Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Gaillard
timelineItems.text: Passage obligatoire en 4-4-1. @divaio9 risque de voir le temps long pour ces 25 dernières minutes #RSLvMTL #MLS #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: M-A Russell
timelineItems.text: I still believe. Let's win this game!! #IMFC #IsseyCtaitPasFortTonChallenge

timelineItems.name: François Séguin
timelineItems.text: There's no points in going with your studs up. No pointS cause now we're gonna lose. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: That was purty! #RSL

timelineItems.name: Meg Marks
timelineItems.text: OLMES FINALLY SCORED A GOAL SCORED A GOAL SCORED A GOAL OLMES FINALLY SCORED A GOAL HEY GAR-CI-A. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Can't catch a break this year. #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: John Coon
timelineItems.text: Garcia's 1st goal of 2014 couldn't have come at a better time for Salt Lake. #RSL has man advantage, can close it out.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Rise and fire! #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Davuth Ly
timelineItems.text: Ouin.. En plus, la game commençait à être intéressante avant le tacle de Issey... #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake News
timelineItems.text: Javier Morales will (justifiably) get credit for the assist after that pinpoint cross. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Au risque de paraître cynique, #IMFC trouve une nouvelle façon de creuser sa propre tombe.

timelineItems.name: MLS Nerd
timelineItems.text: "Launches himself up like a salmon!" - hahaha #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Vous croyez vraiment à la rédemption via la Ligue des Champions de la CONCACAF? Plus croyant que moi... #IMFC #CCL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top center of the goal.

Dangerous play by Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake).
Attempt saved. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Jay!
timelineItems.text: Absolutely love how @OriginalWinger worked a "Donner Party" reference into the #RSLvMTL match.

timelineItems.name: Guy Bolduc
timelineItems.text: Il fait être fait fort émotionellement pour être un partisan de l'Impact ... #ImpactTVASports #Imfc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Kyle Beckerman.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: In case you had forgotten, Nick Rimando is still very good at his job. Keeps it 2-1 with about 15 minutes left. #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Yannick Vézina-Roy
timelineItems.text: Evan Bush prouve à bien des gens (encore) qu'il est calibre MLS malgré le score du match de ce soir. #ImpactTVASports #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Set. Pieces. #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: François Deschamps
timelineItems.text: And still we beat #tfc for the canadian championship... #imfc

timelineItems.name: Benoit Normand
timelineItems.text: L'Impact n'aura plus rien à perdre en ligue des champions. Ils ont déjà tout perdu en MLS! #IMFC #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: It's been over a year since Olmes Garcia's last goal. But the timing couldn't have been better. http://t.co/wjEcM5V8Xp #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: RT if you miss a good team #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Cole Grossman (Real Salt Lake).
Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Dominic Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Aaaaannddd we are back to year 1 #imfc

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Olmes Garcia's last goal in Major League Soccer came in 3-0 win at FC Dallas on July 13, 2013. Tonight was a long time coming. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Javier Morales.
Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Andrés Romero with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Jérémy Bezeau
timelineItems.text: Manque les 5 premieres minutes de la game pis #IMFC perd déjà 1-0... Wow!

timelineItems.name: Danny Petti
timelineItems.text: Historically speaking, is this season worse so far than any TFC season previously? #cantbe #orcanit #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Ned Grabavoyovich
timelineItems.text: After this game Montreal's Ferrari is going to have to change his name to Toyota Tercel #MLS #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Chris Schuler.

timelineItems.name: Alex Cayer
timelineItems.text: #IMFC devrait annoncer publiquement qu'on abandonne le saison, ça libèrerait peut-être la tension

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 3, Montreal Impact 1. Olmes Garcia (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Javier Morales.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Olmes Garcia rifles in his second of the evening

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Frustration palpable sur le terrain. Beaucoup de joueurs qui se regardent après des jeux ratés #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: M
timelineItems.text: Some of the #RSL takeaways from the Impact showing that Montreal done and ready to go home. Keep the pressure on, boys!!

timelineItems.name: ESPN 700
timelineItems.text: GOL-MES with his second! Is it safe to say his scoring drought is gone?! #RSL 3-1 #MTL

timelineItems.name: TWade
timelineItems.text: Yep, he's back! GOlmes!!! #RSL

timelineItems.name: Rachel Donner
timelineItems.text: So the Plata-Garcia dance is pretty much my favorite thing ever. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: That's all she wrote. #IMFC #IMFClive #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Why not get another? It had been a year after all. #GetYourDanceOn #RSLvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Real Salt Lake 3, Montreal Impact 1.
